translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 好了 女士们 先生们

translation.en: this is the moment we've been waiting for. The presenta--
translation.zh: 这是我们一直在等待的时刻 我们…

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight?
translation.zh: 丹尼尔·拉鲁索要参赛？

translation.en: -Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight! -[audience cheers]
translation.zh: 丹尼尔·拉鲁索要参赛

translation.en: Now, isn't this what it's all about, folks?
translation.zh: 这不就是比赛的意义所在吗？

translation.en: [boy 1] Come on, Daniel! Come on, Daniel!
translation.zh: 加油 丹尼尔！

translation.en: -[Johnny grunts] -[audience cheers]
translation.zh: （拉鲁索1分 劳伦斯0分）

translation.en: -Fight! -[Johnny] Hyah!
translation.zh: -开始! -这就对了

translation.en: [man 1] Come on, Daniel! Get him!
translation.zh: 加油 丹尼尔！打他

translation.en: [referee] Turn. Kneel.
translation.zh: 转身 跪下

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, Johnny, you're a cream puff!
translation.zh: 喂 约翰尼 你是个懦夫！

translation.en: Sweep the leg.
translation.zh: 扫他的腿

translation.en: You have a problem with that?
translation.zh: 你不敢用这一招？

translation.en: No, Sensei.
translation.zh: 没有 老师

translation.en: No mercy.
translation.zh: 绝不留情

translation.en: [boy 1] All right, two points!
translation.zh: 好了 两分领先！

translation.en: That's two points, LaRusso. Lawrence, nothing.
translation.zh: 目前拉鲁索两分 劳伦斯零分

translation.en: Ready? Fight!
translation.zh: -加油 丹尼尔！ -准备 开始

translation.en: [referee] One point, Lawrence!
translation.zh: 劳伦斯得一分

translation.en: [official] Point, Lawrence. 2-2.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯得分 现在二比二

translation.en: [boy 2] Get him a body bag! Yeah!
translation.zh: 给他拿个装尸袋！耶！

translation.en: -[referee] Illegal contact to the knee. -[boy 2] Finish him, Johnny!
translation.zh: -警告 非法接触膝盖 -约翰尼 了结他！

translation.en: [announcer] Whoever wins the next point will be our new champion!
translation.zh: 谁赢得下一分 谁就会成为我们的新冠军

translation.en: You finish him, Johnny! Finish him!
translation.zh: 了结他 约翰尼！了结他

translation.en: [announcer] The new champion, Daniel LaRusso!
translation.zh: 新一届冠军 丹尼尔·拉鲁索！

translation.en: Hey, I'm Miguel. My family and I just moved into 109.
translation.zh: 嘿 我叫米格尔 我家人和我刚搬进109室

translation.en: Great. More immigrants.
translation.zh: 很好 又来了移民

translation.en: Actually, we're from Riverside.
translation.zh: 我们其实是里弗赛德来的

translation.en: I was wondering if you were having trouble with your water pressure,
translation.zh: 不知道你有没有觉得水压有问题

translation.en: 'cause I know our sink's being weird right now and…
translation.zh: 因为我觉得我们的水池 现在有点奇怪…

translation.en: Oh, bottles go in the blue bins.
translation.zh: 哦 瓶子应该放进蓝色的垃圾桶

translation.en: Listen, Menudo, I've lived in this shithole for over ten years.
translation.zh: 拉丁小子 听着 我在这个鬼地方住了十多年了

translation.en: The pipe's don't work. The fountain's full of piss.
translation.zh: 水管不灵 喷泉里都是小便

translation.en: The only good thing here is that I don't have to talk to anybody.
translation.zh: 住在这里唯一的好处 是我不用和人说话

translation.en: So, nice knowing you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: OK, well…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: have a nice day…
translation.zh: 祝你今天过得愉快

translation.en: -[car door squeals loudly] -…I guess.
translation.zh: 希望吧

translation.en: [Johnny] You've got to be kidding me.
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑

translation.en: Not another one.
translation.zh: 又来一个

translation.en: ♪ Ha ha, yeah! ♪
translation.zh: （拉鲁索汽车集团 我们踢倒对手）

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [woman] Creep.
translation.zh: 变态

translation.en: Sick.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: -Hey! -[kid] Gotcha.
translation.zh: -喂！ -打到你了

translation.en: -What the hell is this? -Don't worry, it'll be level.
translation.zh: -这是怎么回事？ -别担心 会放正的

translation.en: I'm just lining it up.
translation.zh: 我正在弄直

translation.en: You put it on the wrong wall! I said the wall across from the door.
translation.zh: 不是装在这面墙上 我说过是门对着的那面墙

translation.en: -This is the wall across from the door. -Not that door, idiot. The door.
translation.zh: -这就是门对着的那面墙 -不是这扇门 蠢货 是那扇门

translation.en: Just move the TV. I have company coming over.
translation.zh: 把电视挪一下 我有朋友要来

translation.en: Hold on. I'll have to fill the holes, remeasure, match the paint.
translation.zh: 等一下 我得要把洞补起来 重新测量 给涂料配色

translation.en: It'll take an hour to get to the hardware store.
translation.zh: 光去一下五金店就要一个小时

translation.en: That's not my problem.
translation.zh: 这不是我的问题

translation.en: I'm not the dummy who put the TV on, literally,
translation.zh: 我不是那个把电视装在家里

translation.en: the only wall in the house that a TV would not go.
translation.zh: 唯一不合适放电视的那面墙上的傻瓜

translation.en: Why can't a TV go on this…
translation.zh: 为什么电视不可以…

translation.en: Look, I'll come first thing in the morning and put it just the way you want it.
translation.zh: 我明天一上班就来 按照你的意思做

translation.en: I just can't do it now.
translation.zh: 我现在做不了

translation.en: That's just great. Not bad enough you took a shit in my powder room.
translation.zh: 太好了 在我化妆室里大便 还不够糟吗？

translation.en: -You said that's where I should go. -I didn't know you'd take a shit!
translation.zh: -你说我可以去的 -但我不知道你是要大便

translation.en: OK, we'll figure this out, all right? Just quit bitching at me.
translation.zh: 好了 我们会想办法的 你别再瞎逼逼了

translation.en: What did you just call me?
translation.zh: 你刚才叫我什么？

translation.en: No, no, no! I didn't call her a bitch. I said she was bitching at me.
translation.zh: 没有 我没有叫她傻逼 我是叫她别再瞎逼逼了

translation.en: There's a difference.
translation.zh: 这是有区别的

translation.en: You're firing me because of that bitch?
translation.zh: 你因为那个傻逼解雇我？

translation.en: You know what? I hated this damn job anyway.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？反正我也讨厌这工作

translation.en: You better pay me what you owe me, Mike.
translation.zh: 你最好把欠我的都付清 迈克

translation.en: Mike?
translation.zh: 迈克？

translation.en: [man on radio] Banzai!
translation.zh: 万岁

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm Daniel LaRusso.
translation.zh: 我是丹尼尔·拉鲁索

translation.en: And at LaRusso Auto, we kick the competi--
translation.zh: 拉鲁索汽车集团 我们踢倒对手

translation.en: That one.
translation.zh: 要那个

translation.en: Aren't you gonna wear gloves?
translation.zh: 你不戴手套吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] Where's the Pepto-Bismol?
translation.zh: 止泻药在哪里？

translation.en: [in Spanish] Over there.
translation.zh: 那边

translation.en: Can you put that on a plate?
translation.zh: 可以放在盘子上吗？

translation.en: [in English] My grandma's not feeling well.
translation.zh: -我外婆不舒服 -我没问你

translation.en: Didn't ask. C'mon, what's Spanish for "Just give me my damn slice"?
translation.zh: -我外婆不舒服 -我没问你 “快把我的饼给我” 西班牙语怎么说？

translation.en: [in Spanish] Fucking idiot. He probably has a little dick. [laughs]
translation.zh: 他妈的白痴 他大概是个小鸡巴

translation.en: [in English] What did you just say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: -What did he say? -You don't wanna know.
translation.zh: -他说什么？ -你不会想知道的

translation.en: -I know it's something bad. Just tell me. -Uh, he said you have a tiny…
translation.zh: -我知道不是什么好话 告诉我 -他说你有小…

translation.en: He said I have a tiny wang?
translation.zh: 他说我的鸡巴小？

translation.en: Tell him he has a tiny wang.
translation.zh: 告诉他 他的鸡巴小

translation.en: -[in English] I speak English, asshole. -Oh really?
translation.zh: 我会说英语 傻逼 是吗？

translation.en: Yo, Brucks, get the light beer this time. Gotta cut weight for the meet.
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯 这次拿低卡啤酒吧 运动会前我得减肥了

translation.en: -Hundo P, son! -[boy 2] Damn right.
translation.zh: -没问题 哥们儿 -很好

translation.en: [boy 3] Man, you should get some condoms too.
translation.zh: 伙计 你应该也买些避孕套

translation.en: Finish up and then beat it!
translation.zh: 吃完赶紧走

translation.en: -Excuse me? -[woman] This is my mart.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -这是我的地盘

translation.en: You ain't hustling no coin at my mart.
translation.zh: 你不要想在我的商场挣钱

translation.en: I'm not hustling. I'm not homeless!
translation.zh: 我没抢你的生计 我不是流浪汉

translation.en: That's my car.
translation.zh: 那是我的车

translation.en: [boy 2] What the hell are you doing? Why you gotta blow up my spot?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？为什么要揭穿我？

translation.en: -[Miguel] Dude, I-- -He thought we were in college.
translation.zh: -听我说… -他以为我们上大学了

translation.en: [Miguel] I didn't know you were trying to buy beer. Sorry.
translation.zh: 我不知道你想要买啤酒 对不起

translation.en: -[Brucks] Yes, let's go. -[boy 3] What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: -好了 我们走 -你们要干嘛？

translation.en: -Ooh, what do we got here? -[boy 4] What do you got? Pepto.
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -哦 这是什么？止泻药

translation.en: [boy 3] Oh shit. Someone has frickin' diarrhea!
translation.zh: 哦 靠 有人拉肚子

translation.en: [Brucks] Hey, we should call him 'Rhea.
translation.zh: 我们应该叫他“泻仔”

translation.en: Give it back, dude. It's for my grandma!
translation.zh: -还给我 这是给我外婆买的 -你…

translation.en: [boy 2] Oh, it's for your grandma? Shit, I'm sorry, man.
translation.zh: 哦 是给你外婆的？该死 对不起

translation.en: Hey, you want it? Hey, you can take all that shit.
translation.zh: 你想要吗？都喝了吧…

translation.en: -Take that! Yeah. -[boys laughing]
translation.zh: 都喝了 耶

translation.en: Bitch.
translation.zh: 婊子

translation.en: Asshole.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: -[Brucks] Ooh! -[boy 2] What'd you say, 'Rhea?
translation.zh: 泻仔 你说什么？

translation.en: I… I didn't say anything.
translation.zh: 我什么也没说

translation.en: [boy 4] That's brute, Ky.
translation.zh: 阿凯 真狠啊

translation.en: [boy 3] Yeah. Or what?
translation.zh: 是啊 不然呢？

translation.en: -[Ky] You crying? Where you going, pussy? -[Miguel groans]
translation.zh: -你哭了？ -喂 你要去哪里 娘炮？

translation.en: -[boys snicker] -[Johnny] Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: Watch the car, man.
translation.zh: 小心车

translation.en: Who's this dude?
translation.zh: 这家伙是谁？

translation.en: -Just leave the dork alone. -[Ky] What?
translation.zh: -放过那个书呆子 -什么？

translation.en: You see this guy? Eating his dinner at the mini-mart like a bum.
translation.zh: 你看这家伙 像个流浪汉一样 在小商场吃晩饭

translation.en: -[boys laugh] -[Ky] Wait, I think I know this guy. He's the jerk-off that cleaned my dad's septic tank.
translation.zh: 我想我认识这个家伙 他是给我爸爸清理化粪池的混蛋

translation.en: That explains why he smells like shit.
translation.zh: 这就能解释 为什么他闻起来像屎一样

translation.en: Trust me, you are pissing off the wrong guy on the wrong day, all right?
translation.zh: 告诉你 你在错误的日子惹了错误的人

translation.en: -[Ky] Really? -Yeah, really.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的

translation.en: Get the hell out of here, loser.
translation.zh: 走开 你这废物

translation.en: Let's get him.
translation.zh: 打他

translation.en: [Brucks] Get off me!
translation.zh: 走开

translation.en: -Holy shit. How did you-- -[Ky roars]
translation.zh: 天啊 你是怎么…

translation.en: What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.zh: 怎么了？呼吸困难吗？

translation.en: Is that all you got, ladies?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 你们就这本事？

translation.en: [Brucks] Come on, Ky.
translation.zh: 起来 阿凯

translation.en: -Let's go. -[Ky] Get off me!
translation.zh: -我们走 -放开我！

translation.en: What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.zh: 怎么了？呼吸困难吗？

translation.en: [cop] Hey, get off the kid!
translation.zh: 喂 放开那个孩子！

translation.en: -[Johnny screams] -[Miguel] Hey! It's not his fault!
translation.zh: 喂！这不是他的错！

translation.en: [Miguel] Hey, I just wanted to say thank you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我只是想来向你道谢

translation.en: All right, well, you said it.
translation.zh: 好了 你说过了

translation.en: So, last night, was that, like, Tae Kwon Do or jujitsu or MMA or something?
translation.zh: 昨晚你用的是跆拳道 柔术还是综合格斗之类的？

translation.en: It's karate. Old-school karate.
translation.zh: 是空手道 传统空手道

translation.en: -Do you think you could teach me? -What? No.
translation.zh: -你能教我吗？ -什么？不

translation.en: Come on. When school starts, those guys will make my life miserable.
translation.zh: 别这样 一开学 他们一定会让我不好过的

translation.en: It's not my problem.
translation.zh: 这和我无关

translation.en: Look, if I just knew a little bit of what you knew, then I would be--
translation.zh: 你只需教我一点点你的本事 那我就…

translation.en: Forget it. I don't do karate anymore, all right? Besides, I need to find a job.
translation.zh: 别想了 我不再练空手道了 行了吧？ 再说了 我要找工作

translation.en: Well, you could open your own karate school.
translation.zh: 你可以开一所空手道学校

translation.en: -It's called a dojo. -You could open your own dojo.
translation.zh: -那叫道场 -你可以开一个自己的道场

translation.en: Look, I'm not getting into this with you.
translation.zh: 我想参与到你的破事里

translation.en: I'm not even sure I'm allowed to be around kids right now.
translation.zh: 我都不确定我现在是否 可以和小孩子在一起

translation.en: All right, you want my advice? Stop being so annoying.
translation.zh: 你需要我的建议吗？别那么烦人了

translation.en: Maybe you'll stop getting your ass kicked.
translation.zh: 也许你就不会被人揍了

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You got Encore?
translation.zh: 你有付费频道吗？

translation.en: Yes, ma'am. That's correct, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 是的 女士 正确 法官大人 她…

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: You know those little red stickers that say "further reduced"?
translation.zh: 你知道那些红贴纸上写着“再次降价”

translation.en: That means "spoiled."
translation.zh: 其实就是变质了

translation.en: You know that, right?
translation.zh: 你知道的 对吧？

translation.en: You're eating bad meat, boy.
translation.zh: 你在吃变质了的肉 孩子

translation.en: What the are you doing in my apartment, Sid?
translation.zh: 悉德 你在我公寓里干什么？

translation.en: Oh, that's some "thank you."
translation.zh: 哦 这就是你的“谢谢”

translation.en: Who do you think bailed you out? Again.
translation.zh: 你觉得是谁又一次保释了你？

translation.en: I never asked you for anything.
translation.zh: 我从没向你要过任何东西

translation.en: I think that little incident at Applebee's
translation.zh: 我以为苹果蜂餐厅的那次事件

translation.en: would've taught you to keep your hands to yourself.
translation.zh: 应该教会你别动手打人

translation.en: You know…
translation.zh: 你知道

translation.en: when I met your mom,
translation.zh: 我遇到你妈妈的时候

translation.en: she really knocked my socks off.
translation.zh: 她真的太让我动心了

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 美丽

translation.en: Blonde.
translation.zh: 金发

translation.en: Tan.
translation.zh: 小麦肤色

translation.en: Tight.
translation.zh: 紧致

translation.en: -[groans] -[Sid] Little did I know I'd be taking care of her schmuck kid forever.
translation.zh: 可我真不知道 我需要一直照顾她那个笨蛋儿子

translation.en: [Johnny] Yeah, Sid, you were the stepfather of the century.
translation.zh: 是 悉德 你是百年难遇的继父

translation.en: Well, high praise, coming from a world-class daddy like you.
translation.zh: 像你这样一个世界级的父亲 会给我这么高的评价

translation.en: How old is Robby now, 15, 16?
translation.zh: 罗比多大了？15岁还是16岁了？

translation.en: -When's the last time you saw him? -Just get the hell out of here.
translation.zh: -你最近一次是什么时候见到他的？ -离开这里

translation.en: I'll get the hell out when I'm goddamn good and ready!
translation.zh: 我想走的时候会走的

translation.en: -[woman] Sid. -[Sid] What?
translation.zh: -悉德 小心你的血压 -什么？

translation.en: -Blood pressure! -Keep watching your bullshit judge show,
translation.zh: -悉德 小心你的血压 -什么？ 你就看你那扯淡的审判节目吧 罗达 行吗？

translation.en: will you, Rhonda?
translation.zh: 你就看你那扯淡的审判节目吧 罗达 行吗？

translation.en: And stay out of this!
translation.zh: 别管我们的事

translation.en: Jesus, God.
translation.zh: 天啊 上帝

translation.en: This is why I'm here.
translation.zh: 我来就是为了这个

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: You know, I told your mama I'd take care of you always,
translation.zh: 你知道 我跟你妈妈讲 我会一直照顾你的

translation.en: but in this case,
translation.zh: 不过这种情况下

translation.en: I think even she would cut me some slack.
translation.zh: 我觉得即便是她也会放我一马的

translation.en: I'm buying you out of my life.
translation.zh: 这钱给你 以后不想和你打交道了

translation.en: I'd rather be homeless than take money from you.
translation.zh: 我宁愿流浪也不愿意要你的钱

translation.en: Oh, well, hell. Yeah, OK.
translation.zh: 哦 好啊 行吧

translation.en: Rhonda!
translation.zh: 罗达！

translation.en: Lunchtime!
translation.zh: 该吃午饭了！

translation.en: Call Art's.
translation.zh: 打电话给阿特熟食店

translation.en: See if they got the belly lox.
translation.zh: 看看他们有没有腌三文鱼腩

translation.en: I'd say… get your life in order, but, uh…
translation.zh: 我希望你的生活能走上正轨 但是…

translation.en: at this point, you're like the meat in your fridge.
translation.zh: 你现在就像是你冰箱里的肉

translation.en: Chappy! Chappy, where are you?
translation.zh: 查皮 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Just put in that tape. That's an order!
translation.zh: 把录音带放进去 这是命令 你帮不了我

translation.en: -Nothing you can do about me. -[man 1] Chappy, I want to help you!
translation.zh: 把录音带放进去 这是命令 你帮不了我 查皮 我想帮你 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 查皮 我想帮你 你在哪儿？

translation.en: [Chappy] Climb high, like I told you!
translation.zh: 向上爬升 就像我告诉过你的一样

translation.en: -[alarm buzzing on television] -Doug, I ain't gonna make it.
translation.zh: 道格 我不成了

translation.en: -[explosion on television] -Chappy!
translation.zh: 查皮

translation.en: [man on tape] A bunch of things must have gone wrong if you're listening to this.
translation.zh: 如果你在听这个录音 一定有很多事情出了问题

translation.en: Whatever happened, I know you must be real scared.
translation.zh: 无论发生了什么 我知道你一定很害怕

translation.en: Right now, you're probably filled with all the doubts in the world.
translation.zh: 现在你一定在怀疑人生

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you something, Dougie.
translation.zh: 但我要告诉你 道格

translation.en: God doesn't give people things He doesn't want 'em to use.
translation.zh: 上帝给你的东西 就是希望你使用的

translation.en: And He gave you the touch.
translation.zh: 他给了你这一天赋

translation.en: It's a power you have inside of you,
translation.zh: 这是你内在的力量

translation.en: down there where you keep your guts, boy.
translation.zh: 就在你身体里面 小子！

translation.en: It's all you need to blast your way in and get back what they took from you.
translation.zh: 有了它 你就能破空而出 夺回属于你的东西

translation.en: Banzai!
translation.zh: 万岁！

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso here for LaRusso Auto,
translation.zh: 我是拉鲁索汽车集团的 丹尼尔·拉鲁索

translation.en: bringing you specials on all of our inventory.
translation.zh: 我们所有的车都在搞促销活动

translation.en: We have an excess of Jeep Grand Cherokees priced to go.
translation.zh: 我们有大量的特价吉普大切诺基

translation.en: Get a lease for only…
translation.zh: 长期租赁价格是…

translation.en: Nah. Make that… Chop!
translation.zh: 不 再砍一下！

translation.en: Yes, we are chopping prices on all of our Hondas, Nissans, Acuras, and Audis.
translation.zh: 是的 我们的本田、尼桑 讴歌和奥迪都在降价销售

translation.en: So come visit any of our locations in Tarzana, Woodland Hills,
translation.zh: 所以请到我们位于 塔尔扎纳、伍德兰希尔斯

translation.en: North Hollywood or Sherman Oaks.
translation.zh: 北好莱坞或者是谢尔曼奥克斯的门店

translation.en: And as always, every customer leaves with their very own bonsai tree.
translation.zh: 和以往一样 每个客户 都会带走属于自己的盆景树

translation.en: LaRusso Auto Group. We kick the competition.
translation.zh: 拉鲁索汽车集团 我们踢倒对手

translation.en: -Yeah! -All right!
translation.zh: -耶 -好啊

translation.en: -[man] Hai! -[students] Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah!
translation.zh: -嘿！ -出拳！

translation.en: ♪ These daydreams ♪
translation.zh: （全谷体育馆）

translation.en: [Johnny] I got second place.
translation.zh: -我得了亚军 -亚军根本就不算名次

translation.en: [man] Second place is no place! You're off the team!
translation.zh: -我得了亚军 -亚军根本就不算名次 -你被队里除名了 -太糟了 我尽力了

translation.en: -[Johnny] That sucks! I did my best. -What did you say?
translation.zh: -你被队里除名了 -太糟了 我尽力了 -你说什么？ -我说我尽力了

translation.en: -[Johnny] I said I did my best! -You're nothing! You lost! You're a loser!
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -我说我尽力了 你一文不值！你输了！ 你是个失败者！

translation.en: -[Johnny] No, you're the loser, man. -Oh, I'm the loser, huh?
translation.zh: -不 你才是失败者 -哦 我是失败者？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -Now who's the loser? -[Johnny] You know, you're really sick.
translation.zh: -现在谁是失败者？ -你知道吗？你很病态

translation.en: -Hey! [Johnny choking] -Hey, come on!
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿 别这样！

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -Don't…
translation.zh: -嘿 你在干什么？ -不要…

translation.en: How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.zh: 拿到亚军现在是什么感觉？

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on! He can't breathe. -Mind your business!
translation.zh: -别这样 他无法呼吸了 -管好你自己的事

translation.en: [boy 2] You're gonna kill him! [boy 1] Sensei, please! You're hurting him!
translation.zh: -你这样会弄死他的 -老师 求你了 你伤到他了

translation.en: [man] How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.zh: 现在第二名的感觉如何？

translation.en: -[girl gasps] -Oh my God.
translation.zh: 哦 天啊

translation.en: I told you, you shouldn't be on your phone.
translation.zh: 我和你说过 开车不能用电话

translation.en: -What the-- -[liquor bottle smashes]
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼…

translation.en: -What are we gonna do? -We have to call the police.
translation.zh: -我们该怎么办？ -我们得叫警察

translation.en: -We can't! My parents will kill me! -What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: -不行 我爸妈会杀了我 -你们干什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing? Open the door! -[girls screaming] Open the door!
translation.zh: 你们干什么？开门！

translation.en: Drive! Drive!
translation.zh: 开车！

translation.en: Hey! Where do you think you're going? Where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: 喂 你们要去哪里？

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Oh, come o--
translation.zh: 哦 搞什么…

translation.en: -Take care of her. She's a classic. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 小心点 这可是经典款

translation.en: -Hey, where do I pick it up? -It's on the card.
translation.zh: -喂 我到哪里取车？ -卡上有写

translation.en: [Johnny] LaRusso?
translation.zh: 拉鲁索

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 怎么会这样

translation.en: How you doing? Would you be interested in--
translation.zh: 你好吗？你有没有兴趣…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [woman] You're all set.
translation.zh: 好了 都弄好了

translation.en: -Have a great day. -[man 1] Thank you.
translation.zh: -非常感谢 祝你有愉快的一天 -谢谢

translation.en: Hi, welcome to LaRusso.
translation.zh: 你好 欢迎来到拉鲁索

translation.en: How can I help you?
translation.zh: 有什么能帮你的？

translation.en: Hi, I just need to pick up my car.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是来取车的

translation.en: I'm in a bit of a hurry.
translation.zh: 我赶时间

translation.en: Oh, this came in last night?
translation.zh: 哦 这是昨晚送来的？

translation.en: It'll be a couple of weeks, but we'll call you with an estimate.
translation.zh: 得要几周 但我们会给你打电话 告诉你估计的维修费

translation.en: No, my car was not supposed to come here. I want it towed to a different body shop.
translation.zh: 不 我的车本来就不该来这里 我希望把它拖到其他维修店

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: We have the number one service team in the Valley.
translation.zh: 我们有全谷最好的维修团队

translation.en: We beat all prices.
translation.zh: 而且价格最优

translation.en: We kick the competition.
translation.zh: 我们踢倒对手

translation.en: I've heard it a million times. I just prefer to do my business elsewhere.
translation.zh: 是啊 我听过无数遍了 我只是希望到其他地方去修

translation.en: [man 2] And here are the watering instructions.
translation.zh: 这是有关浇水的说明

translation.en: Thanks for being returning customers.
translation.zh: 感谢你们再次光临

translation.en: Before you go, Mr. LaRusso wanted to thank you personally.
translation.zh: 走之前 拉鲁索先生 想亲自向你们表示感谢

translation.en: Let me go get him.
translation.zh: 我去叫他

translation.en: -Can you hurry it up? I gotta go. -[woman] Hold on.
translation.zh: -麻烦你快点行吗？我要走了 -等一下

translation.en: Um, it says your car is in one of our intake lots.
translation.zh: 这里显示你的车在我们的一个收取点

translation.en: -I'll figure out which one. -You know what? I'll come back tomorrow.
translation.zh: -我来查一下是哪一个 -这样吧 我明天再来

translation.en: [woman] But, sir, I--
translation.zh: 但是 先生 我…

translation.en: [Daniel] Johnny?
translation.zh: 约翰尼？

translation.en: Johnny Lawrence! I… I… I knew it was you!
translation.zh: 约翰尼·劳伦斯 我就知道是你

translation.en: Holy… How the hell are you?
translation.zh: 天啊 你怎么样？

translation.en: -Hey, man. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 嘿 你好

translation.en: [Daniel] Oh my God, look at you.
translation.zh: 哇 天啊 看看你

translation.en: You still got those golden locks, eh?
translation.zh: 你还是一头金色卷发

translation.en: God, this is crazy. How you been?
translation.zh: 这太不可思议了 你怎么样？

translation.en: -Great, man. Thanks, I've been great. -That's great.
translation.zh: -很好 谢谢 我很好 -那太好了

translation.en: Anoush, come here! Louie, get over here! I want you to meet somebody.
translation.zh: 阿努什 来 路易 过来 我给你们介绍

translation.en: -I gotta go. -No, no, no. This is Johnny Lawrence.
translation.zh: -我要走了 -别啊 这是约翰尼·劳伦斯

translation.en: He and I go way back. Right, buddy?
translation.zh: 我和他很早就认识了 对吧？

translation.en: This guy was the toughest dude in my high school.
translation.zh: 他是我高中里最难搞的家伙

translation.en: When I first moved here from Jersey, he and I… we got into a little bit.
translation.zh: 我刚从泽西岛搬到这里时 我们之间还有些摩擦

translation.en: This guy really had it in for me.
translation.zh: 这家伙总和我过不去

translation.en: Well, you did move in on my girl.
translation.zh: 嗯 你抢走了我的女朋友

translation.en: Well, she actually wasn't really your girl anymore, was she?
translation.zh: 其实她那时已经不是你女朋友了吧？

translation.en: I mean…
translation.zh: 我的意思是…

translation.en: All right. That's all water under the bridge.
translation.zh: 那些都是过去的事了

translation.en: Wait. Is this the karate guy, the guy from the tournament?
translation.zh: 等一下 这是不是那个参加 空手道锦标赛的家伙？

translation.en: Oh, this is the guy whose ass you kicked.
translation.zh: 哦 就是被你打败的那个

translation.en: [Daniel] Uh, listen, it was a really close match.
translation.zh: 嗯 听我说 那是场势均力敌的比赛

translation.en: But if you wanna get technical… I kicked his face.
translation.zh: 不过如果你们想探讨技术方面的细节 我踢了他的脸

translation.en: -[Daniel, Louie laughing] -I'm just busting your chops.
translation.zh: 我只是在跟你开玩笑

translation.en: It was an illegal kick.
translation.zh: 那一脚是不合规的

translation.en: Oh, illegal? Really? Come on. What about that elbow to my knee?
translation.zh: 哦 不合规 是吗？ 拜托 那你的肘打在我膝盖上呢？

translation.en: Yeah, I got a warning. You got the win.
translation.zh: 是的 我得到了警告 你得到了奖杯

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! No fighting in the showroom, guys.
translation.zh: 伙计们 别在展示厅里打架

translation.en: [Daniel] Come on. All right, back to work.
translation.zh: 好了 回去做事吧

translation.en: -Nice meeting you. -Get back to work.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 -走吧 回去做事

translation.en: Enough reminiscing, right?
translation.zh: 别再纠结过去了 对吧？

translation.en: So, what brings you in? You're looking for a new a ride?
translation.zh: 什么风把你吹来了？你想买辆新车？

translation.en: He wants his car towed to a different body shop.
translation.zh: 他想把车拖去别的维修店

translation.en: Oh no, Johnny. We got the best prices in town.
translation.zh: 哦 不要 约翰尼 这个地区我们的价格最好

translation.en: That crook at Cole's on Van Nuys, he'll try to screw you over.
translation.zh: 范奈斯科尔车行的那个恶棍 他肯定会宰你的

translation.en: Sheila, let me see the estimate.
translation.zh: 希拉 我看看估价

translation.en: A Pontiac?
translation.zh: 是庞蒂克？

translation.en: -Firebird? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -火鸟？ -是

translation.en: Wow, someone did a real number on this thing.
translation.zh: 哇 被人撞得够厉害的

translation.en: Maybe it's time for an upgrade. Why don't we walk the lot?
translation.zh: 也许该是时候升级了 一起去停车场看看吧？

translation.en: I'll give you a deal on a certified pre-owned--
translation.zh: 那些认证过的二手车 我会给你个好价…

translation.en: I just want my car.
translation.zh: 我只想要我的车

translation.en: All right, all right. You got it, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧 没问题

translation.en: Let me see how low I can get this repair.
translation.zh: 我来看看修好最少要多少钱

translation.en: Friends and family… my own personal code.
translation.zh: 亲友价 用我自己的打折码

translation.en: You know what? It's on the house.
translation.zh: 这样吧 我们免费给你修

translation.en: -No way. I don't need your charity. -No, you'd be doing me a favor.
translation.zh: -不 我不需要你的施舍 -不 你这样是帮我的忙

translation.en: Our guys aren't used to working on a car like this.
translation.zh: 我的人很少有机会遇到这样的车

translation.en: They could use the practice. You could use the repairs.
translation.zh: 他们可以当做练习 你也能修好你的车

translation.en: -This is a win-win. -I said I'll handle it.
translation.zh: -这是双赢 -我说了我自己解决

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: OK, but it's… John, it's gonna cost more than the car is worth.
translation.zh: 但是约翰尼 维修费比车本身都贵

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about it. It's my pleasure, all right?
translation.zh: 听我说 别担心 我很愿意帮你的 好吗？

translation.en: -All right. -OK? Just hang here a second.
translation.zh: -好吧 -好吗？在这里等我一下

translation.en: I got something for you. One minute.
translation.zh: 我有东西给你 就一会儿

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: -Hey, Dad! -[Daniel] Look who's here.
translation.zh: -嘿 爸爸 -看看谁来了

translation.en: -[screaming] -What are you doing? Open the door!
translation.zh: 你们干什么？开门！

translation.en: -I'm good. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: -我很好 -怎么会这么巧

translation.en: Of course. Go ahead. In the office.
translation.zh: 当然 去吧 在办公室里

translation.en: -[girl] See you later. -OK.
translation.zh: -回见 -好

translation.en: Hey, Johnny, wait up! Johnny! Wait up.
translation.zh: 喂 约翰尼 等一下

translation.en: Every customer gets one.
translation.zh: 每个客户都有这个 拿着

translation.en: And, hey, look, I don't blame you for what happened back in the day.
translation.zh: 听我说 我不会为过去发生的事责怪你

translation.en: All right, I know that wasn't you. It was Cobra Kai.
translation.zh: 我知道不是你 是眼镜蛇干的

translation.en: We're all better off without it, am I right?
translation.zh: 没有了它 对大家都好 是吧？

translation.en: Take care of yourself, and I'll call you when the car's ready, OK?
translation.zh: 保重 车好了我会打电话给你

translation.en: This is crazy! You look… You look… It's good to see you, man.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了 你看起来… 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Are you sure you're ready?
translation.zh: 你确定你准备好了？

translation.en: 'Cause once you go down this path, there's no turning back.
translation.zh: 因为一旦你走上这条路 就没有回头路了

translation.en: -You're gonna be my karate teacher? -No.
translation.zh: -你要做我的空手道教练吗？ -不

translation.en: I'm gonna be your sensei.
translation.zh: 我会是你的老师

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you the style of karate that was taught to me,
translation.zh: 我要把我以前学的 那种风格的空手道教给你

translation.en: a method of fighting your pussy generation desperately needs.
translation.zh: 那是你们这胆小的一代人 非常需要的战斗方法

translation.en: -[man] Good luck. It's all yours. -All right.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 这是你的了 好的

translation.en: I'm not just gonna teach you how to conquer your fears.
translation.zh: 我不只是要教你如何克服恐惧

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you how to awaken the snake within you.
translation.zh: 我还要教你如何唤醒你内心的蛇

translation.en: And once you do that,
translation.zh: 一旦你做到这一点 别人就会害怕你

translation.en: you'll be the one who's feared.
translation.zh: 一旦你做到这一点 别人就会害怕你 （先发制人 全力出击 绝不留情）

translation.en: You'll build strength.
translation.zh: 你会变得有力量

translation.en: You'll learn discipline.
translation.zh: 你会学会自律

translation.en: And when the time is right,
translation.zh: 当时机合适的时候

translation.en: you'll strike back.
translation.zh: 你会反击
